name: MAPLESS
description:
Uploaded for the FragmentJam 2019.

It's a first-person dungeon crawler with turn based combat, inspired by the Etrian Odyssey series.

You should be able to generate a team of 4 heroes ( make sure not to pick the same class/sex combination multiple times or else there's a chance it COULD lead to a bug that deletes party members  )

Furthermore, you should be able to talk to NPCs and explore the MAPLESS dungeon. 

There are enemies to fight and equipment / items to buy. 

There are quite a few floors... let's see how far you can push it, but there is no ending yet..

Please feel free to enjoy.

( made on RMXP )
